website_summaries.verdict: Signature mid-cut basketball shoe with Charged Cushioning enhances first-step speed and change of direction.
pros: Innovative shoe with good support and fit
Responsive cushioning feature absorbs and redirects energy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and great fit, but ended up with wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I just got these shoes to replace my 3 year old Nike gyms shoes. They fit great and I really like the ankle support. I wear 10.5 for all my athletic shoes (running, trainers, and basketball shoes) and these fit just right. I'm deducting 1 star because the Black color I selected on Amazon shows a different color scheme (Yellow UA logo with gray soles), but the one I received is a completely blacked out color scheme. I decided to keep it since I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning and getting a new pair since these will only be using primarily at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pair of basketball shoes I have ever had. Looks solid. Not cheap-looking stuff like Adidas and Nike. Solid protection to your ankles, well balanced, near perfect shoes. I can't find any cons. My first experience with UA, planning to be a loyal customer
customer_reviews.author: Hari Venu Radha

customer_reviews.title: High quality item - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very nice shoe - high quality and excellent workmanship. Our son is also extremely pleased and will be wearing them for basketball this year. We support the Under Armour product line, and these are also our son's school colors. In addition, these were specifically purchased these to replace our son's brand new Nike basketball shoes we purchased earlier this summer that we no longer want our son wearing. Those will be boxed and placed in the basement until the foreseeable future...
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: my left toes bent with a bit of comfort around the heel
customer_reviews.text: I bought size 12, a half bigger than already. But the front part of the shoe causes my toes to bend inward with sock (left shoe). I hate the external material - it looks so cheap (plastic). Why don't the shoe manufacturers make shoes with the old material/leather anymore? I gave 3 for the padding material on the heel area. I'll probably have to cut a bit top parts of my toes to move freely without bending them. Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Rocky C.

customer_reviews.title: Worst experience.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy with the shoes . Sole get separated from front portion. Using only since 1 week . Didn't expect these from Under armour .
customer_reviews.author: Suraj P.

customer_reviews.title: A Player's Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. I've always worn Jordan's, but thought I'd try a pair of Curry's and they feel great! They're lightweight and have a good amount of ankle support. Durable with a comfortable bounce to them. They're a little difficult to lace, but nothing to drop a star over. I would definitely buy again and highly recommend for players of any skill level. Nice job, UA.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz McGee

customer_reviews.title: Delivery Unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were ordered as a Christmas gift. The delivery was scheduled on December 24. What the message did not include is that the shoes would be delivered to the post office, not my home, on December 24. Thus, we did not have them until December 26. The quality of the shoes is fine, however, my husband who wears a 9 1/2 normally, could not even get them on. Keep in mind that a normal 9 1/2 foot requires a size 11 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these shoes for my son who has ankle problems. He gets two years out of them and we normally buy him a pair every other year because they are that well made. Very comfortable, support ankles, excellent for everyday wear. Shoe's look identical to advertisement picture. We have bought this brand of shoes for the last 4 year. Very very pleased and plan on continue buying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mounce

customer_reviews.title: Great, snug ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I love the Curry 3s but the price, even though a few years old, doesnt seem to drop on those so I gave these a shot. After a short break-in period, i like these 3zeros better than the Curry 3s. The ankle support is superior, it feels snug all around the upper foot/ankle area which has been great. I generally need shoes that are wider (2 or 3e) and these (along with the 3s) have fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Goofy looking
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing for my husband. He might not agree but he looks like a big Smurf in these shoes. I really am sort of embarrassed to be around him with these goofy blue shoes on. When will we quit trying to be like players out on the court and just play for the fun of it?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Frasure

customer_reviews.title: Ordered one color and got a completely different color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the aluminum color and got light gray with light gray uppers. It looks like a completely different shoe. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Sleonhard

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat happy and sad
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to purchase it but then when my husband wore them he said he feels uncomfortable so he didn’t wear them on his game unfortunately. But he said perhaps because it’s new! And not used to it. But yeah he is wearing his old shoes
customer_reviews.author: jhemie

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time ever I bought a pair of shoes online. With shoes, I have always believed that you need to try them on and walk around a little to get a good fit. Just wearing them around the house so far, all I can say is that these fit great. I also feel slightly taller with these shoes. And that's not a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so comfortable. I have had these a little over a ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. I have had these a little over a month and have used them every day. I bought these to run in and they offer great support. I struggle
customer_reviews.author: Lance E. Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Misleading/False Adverstisement
customer_reviews.text: The first picture....what is advertised as "Grey" is what I ordered. I ordered the dark grey shoes that have the turquoise/green bottoms which is what is advertised as "GREY" on the site. The second picture...the light grey almost white shoe is what I received today. PLEASE fix the site so that what people order is what is advertised and what they receieve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. Never owned a pair of UA shoes and was not expecting much. Not bad to play a few pick-up games in.
customer_reviews.author: greenwolf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Basketball
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needs some shoes to ball at school and she really rocked these. Great balling shoes for price
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Perry

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I have wide feet and have trouble finding basketball shoes that fit. These have been great, and the price is wonderful compared to a lot of basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issue
customer_reviews.text: I have other U/A shoes that I wear a size 11. I had to get a 12 in this shoe and still a little tight at the ball of foot. Shoe looks good, but not a comfortable as my previous U/A shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jenea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe but so so material
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is beautiful but the material front part of the shoe buckled within hours of wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son love it and the cost was better than anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY, NOT NEW
customer_reviews.text: As you can see by the photos, these arrived stained and in a horrible box that is clear to me that these items are not new and are poorly handled before shipping. Will be demanding a refund ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: All Round Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, fits great and the product provider was exceptional in service.
customer_reviews.author: Heemi

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff but once you break them in they are golden!
customer_reviews.author: greenbc

customer_reviews.title: The shoe came with the anti-theft tag still on it.
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes--I've had several pairs--but these arrives with the anti-theft tag on them (the plastic thing that stores put on clothes so you can't walk out past the sensor). Luckily I got a refund when I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: A little rough on wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the colorwave of these shoes. The purple is beautiful. However for sizing the shoe fits a little tight on wide footed people. That with time will for sure will break in, but for now it's a 4 star for that sole-fact. no pun intended
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Unfortunately they sent me the wrong color two times in a row. So I ended up just keeping the all white and grey color. Definitely would buy another pair.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product! Shipping extremely fast!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit!! Very nice shoe! Very highly recommended buying from seller again! Thank you!!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: They are a very comfortable shoe and seem to be well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I've only played in them once so far. They are a very comfortable shoe and seem to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Yay mom!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Steph Curry and she loves these shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Solid basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he loves them. He had them for two days before wearing them to a basketball tournament. No complaints- they’re holding up great!

customer_reviews.title: The size run like Nike shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, I highly recommend these shoes, they give you the support and cushion that you need either for long walk or long standing time. They literally hugs you feet like custom shoes. Just perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lousy
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of these shoes at all. I get blisters every time I play from sliding around and they don't lace up well. First and last user armors.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes right out of the box. Sized just right. Couldn't ask for more from a shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great arch for foot and comfortable. A really good sneaker.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Fit great and look great. The only thing I would change, is the length of the shoe strings that are too short. But, other than that these shoes are great. I have not tried them on the court yet, but I will soon.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball sneaks
customer_reviews.text: Light and great for ball, I'm loving these so far. First pair of basketball shoes that i played in without breaking them in and didn't end up with a foot covered in blisters.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe, but the seams are already falling apart and I’ve only worn them a few times. Clearly not new shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.....but
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was absolutely amazing. First of all, it came 10 days before. It has awesome cushion and traction. However, the shoes came in an unmarked box and had a couple small cuffs and scratches. Nice product overall.

customer_reviews.title: Well made

customer_reviews.title: Good for Pickleball
customer_reviews.text: I play pickleball and these shoes have a nice grip on the court. They cradle my feet so the shoes and my feet becomes one. They also have good absorption from the impact of the court surface.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Most important to know is that they look real good and I especially like the ankle support
customer_reviews.text: They are nice af but when I ran too much they would start hurting the edge of my foot because the sole was too narrow or my foot too wide haha PS. I have a normal foot

customer_reviews.title: Too tight, not enough ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed with these. I had great luck with the Curry 2's and was expecting more of the same. The traction and step in comfort are two positives, but the laces come loose as you play, causing the ankle support to suffer greatly, and they are bit narrow. For me, they were just too uncomfortable and unsupportive to play in. Sent them off for a return.

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Curry 3 Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Stephen Curry's third signature model, the Under Armour Curry 3, is delivers support and control in a very lightweight package. They are crafted with synthetic Threadborne upper, feature a carbon fiber shank for stability, Charged Cushioning technology for shock absorption, and a rubber outsole with multidirectional traction pattern.
feature_bullets: Meta-Wing carbon fiber shank increases stability and enhances support
New Anafoam material wraps the foot for a customized fit and feel
Charged foam in the midsole adapts to your every move and allows for explosive takeoffs
Midsole foam is soft and pliable when you are moving slowly, but firm during quick movements
Charged cushioning absorbs impact, converting it into energy for superior bounceback
